DOC.brief_title: Intervention Development Newly Diagnosed Youth With HIV
DOC.detailed_description: Providers participate one interview approximately one-hour duration ; interview expect occur 2 month period . Following completion provider interview , participant participate one 2-hour focus group . A total 6 focus group ( 2 3 study site ) anticipate occur 6-8 week period . The complete study duration expect take 12 month . Part A - Provider interview - 15 clinical provider , 15 mental health provider , 15 case manager ( 1 provider category per ATN site result total 45 interview ) . Part B - Focus group - 36-48 youth living HIV . It estimate 6-8 participant per group conduct two group three different site ( one male specific group one female specific group ) total six focus group . One third focus group conduct Spanish . The provider interview comprise participant clinical provider , mental health provider , case manager least 1 year experience work HIV+ youth ; one category interview 15 ATN site . The focus group comprise participant age 16 24 , diagnose HIV+ aware HIV diagnosis 12-24 month , receive service three select ATN sit community partner . Focus group participant balance reflect diversity ( i.e. , age , pregnant parent woman , MSM , mono-lingual Spanish-speaking , etc . ) clinic population .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed HIV+ aware HIV status 1224 month Between age 1624 ( inclusive ) Gives informed consent participation Presence serious psychiatric symptom ( active hallucination , think disorder ) Visibly distraught ( suicidal , homicidal , exhibit violent behavior ) Intoxicated influence alcohol substance time study entry Acquired HIV perinatal infection
